channel.title: Compute :: My Blog Page
channel.description: 1. What is computing? 1.1 Components CPU: Runs and processes the instructions that it is given RAM: Stores data that the computer needs to carry out processing tasks Temporary storage Hard drive: Long-term storage Stores the boot files and files that you create Network performance: Measured by Bandwidth: the amount of data that can be sent over a specified time Latency: How long it takes the data to travel 1.2 Benefits of cloud computing Save on costs:
